title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 940/90 of 11 April 1990 reintroducing the levying of the customs duties applicable to reception apparatus of CN codes 8527, 8528 and 8529 originating in China to which the preferential arrangements of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3896/89 apply
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 940/90
of 11 April 1990
reintroducing the levying of the customs duties applicable to reception apparatus of CN codes 8527, 8528 and 8529 originating in China to which the preferential arrangements of Council Regulation (EEC) No 3896/89 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 April 1990.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission 8529 10 70 8529 10 90 8529 90 99
